panels.title: gitlab_shell SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

We monitor GitLab shell, using HAProxy SSH connection information.



### Observability Tools

* [üìñ Kibana: GitLab Shell logs](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/discover?_a=(columns:!(json.command,json.msg,json.level,json.gl_project_path,json.error),filters:!((query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.type:(query:git,type:phrase))))),index:'AWORyp9K1NBBQZg_dXA9')&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [üìñ Kibana: GitLab Shell failed request logs](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/discover?_a=(columns:!(json.command,json.msg,json.level,json.gl_project_path,json.error),filters:!((query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.type:(query:git,type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.level:(query:error,type:phrase))))),index:'AWORyp9K1NBBQZg_dXA9')&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [üìà Kibana: GitLab Shell requests](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/visualize/create?type=line&indexPattern=AWORyp9K1NBBQZg_dXA9&_a=(filters:!((query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.type:(query:git,type:phrase))))),query:(language:kuery,query:''),vis:(aggs:!((enabled:!t,id:'1',params:(),schema:metric,type:count),(enabled:!t,id:'2',params:(drop_partials:!t,extended_bounds:(),field:json.time,interval:auto,min_doc_count:1,scaleMetricValues:!f,timeRange:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}'),useNormalizedEsInterval:!t),schema:segment,type:date_histogram))))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [üìà Kibana: GitLab Shell failed requests](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/visualize/create?type=line&indexPattern=AWORyp9K1NBBQZg_dXA9&_a=(filters:!((query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.type:(query:git,type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.level:(query:error,type:phrase))))),query:(language:kuery,query:''),vis:(aggs:!((enabled:!t,id:'1',params:(),schema:metric,type:count),(enabled:!t,id:'2',params:(drop_partials:!t,extended_bounds:(),field:json.time,interval:auto,min_doc_count:1,scaleMetricValues:!f,timeRange:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}'),useNormalizedEsInterval:!t),schema:segment,type:date_histogram))))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))

panels.title: gitlab_sshd SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

Monitors Gitlab-sshd, using the connections bucket, and http requests bucket.



### Observability Tools

* [üìñ Kibana: GitLab Shell logs](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/discover?_a=(columns:!(json.command,json.msg,json.level,json.gl_project_path,json.error),filters:!((query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.type:(query:git,type:phrase))))),index:'AWORyp9K1NBBQZg_dXA9')&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))

* [üìà Kibana: GitLab Shell failed requests](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/visualize/create?type=line&indexPattern=AWORyp9K1NBBQZg_dXA9&_a=(filters:!((query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.type:(query:git,type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.level:(query:error,type:phrase))))),query:(language:kuery,query:''),vis:(aggs:!((enabled:!t,id:'1',params:(),schema:metric,type:count),(enabled:!t,id:'2',params:(drop_partials:!t,extended_bounds:(),field:json.time,interval:auto,min_doc_count:1,scaleMetricValues:!f,timeRange:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}'),useNormalizedEsInterval:!t),schema:segment,type:date_histogram))))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))

panels.title: loadbalancer SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

Measures aggregated HTTP request traffic through the HAProxy.
5xx responses are considered to be failures.



### Observability Tools

* [BigQuery: Top http clients by number of requests, cny stage, 10m](https://console.cloud.google.com/bigquery?project=gitlab-production&sq=805818759045:dea839bd669e41b5bc264c510294bb9f)
* [BigQuery: Top http clients by number of requests, main stage, 10m](https://console.cloud.google.com/bigquery?project=gitlab-production&sq=805818759045:704c6bdf00a743d195d344306bf207ee)
panels.title: Details

panels.title: loadbalancer_ssh SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

Measures aggregated L4 traffic through the HAProxy. Traffic is measured in TCP connections,
with upstream TCP connection failures being treated as service-level failures.



### Observability Tools

* [BigQuery: Top ssh clients by number of requests, 10m](https://console.cloud.google.com/bigquery?project=gitlab-production&sq=805818759045:8a185b18fafe4081bf9fbdb5354844f9)

panels.content:
### Description

Monitors Rails endpoints, running in the Git fleet, via the HTTP interface.



### Observability Tools

* [üêû Sentry Releases: gitlab/gitlabcom](https://sentry.gitlab.net/gitlab/gitlabcom/releases?environment=${environment})
* [üêû Sentry git issues](https://sentry.gitlab.net/gitlab/gitlabcom/issues?environment=${environment}&query=stage%3A${stage}+type%3Agit)

panels.title: rails_requests SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

The number of requests meeting their duration target based on the urgency
of the endpoint. By default, a request should take no more than 1s. But
this can be adjusted by endpoint.

Read more about this in the [documentation](https://docs.gitlab.com/ee/development/application_slis/rails_request_apdex.html).



### Observability Tools

* [üìñ Kibana: Rails logs](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/discover?_a=(columns:!(json.method,json.status,json.controller,json.action,json.path,json.duration_s),filters:!((query:(match:(json.type.keyword:(query:git,type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.type:(query:git,type:phrase))))),index:'7092c4e2-4eb5-46f2-8305-a7da2edad090')&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [üìñ Kibana: Rails slow request logs](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/discover?_a=(columns:!(json.method,json.status,json.controller,json.action,json.path,json.duration_s),filters:!((query:(match:(json.type.keyword:(query:git,type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.type:(query:git,type:phrase)))),(query:(range:(json.duration_s:(gte:1))))),index:'7092c4e2-4eb5-46f2-8305-a7da2edad090',sort:!(!(json.duration_s,desc)))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [üìñ Kibana: Rails failed request logs](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/discover?_a=(columns:!(json.method,json.status,json.controller,json.action,json.path,json.duration_s),filters:!((query:(match:(json.type.keyword:(query:git,type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.type:(query:git,type:phrase)))),(query:(range:(json.status:(gte:500))))),index:'7092c4e2-4eb5-46f2-8305-a7da2edad090')&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [üìà Kibana: Rails requests](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/visualize/create?type=line&indexPattern=7092c4e2-4eb5-46f2-8305-a7da2edad090&_a=(filters:!((query:(match:(json.type.keyword:(query:git,type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.type:(query:git,type:phrase))))),query:(language:kuery,query:''),vis:(aggs:!((enabled:!t,id:'1',params:(),schema:metric,type:count),(enabled:!t,id:'2',params:(drop_partials:!t,extended_bounds:(),field:json.time,interval:auto,min_doc_count:1,scaleMetricValues:!f,timeRange:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}'),useNormalizedEsInterval:!t),schema:segment,type:date_histogram))))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [üìà Kibana: Rails failed requests](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/visualize/create?type=line&indexPattern=7092c4e2-4eb5-46f2-8305-a7da2edad090&_a=(filters:!((query:(match:(json.type.keyword:(query:git,type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.type:(query:git,type:phrase)))),(query:(range:(json.status:(gte:500))))),query:(language:kuery,query:''),vis:(aggs:!((enabled:!t,id:'1',params:(),schema:metric,type:count),(enabled:!t,id:'2',params:(drop_partials:!t,extended_bounds:(),field:json.time,interval:auto,min_doc_count:1,scaleMetricValues:!f,timeRange:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}'),useNormalizedEsInterval:!t),schema:segment,type:date_histogram))))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [üìà Kibana: Rails sum latency aggregated](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/visualize/create?type=line&indexPattern=7092c4e2-4eb5-46f2-8305-a7da2edad090&_a=(filters:!((query:(match:(json.type.keyword:(query:git,type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.type:(query:git,type:phrase))))),query:(language:kuery,query:''),vis:(aggs:!((enabled:!t,id:'1',params:(field:json.duration_s),schema:metric,type:sum),(enabled:!t,id:'2',params:(drop_partials:!t,extended_bounds:(),field:json.time,interval:auto,min_doc_count:1,scaleMetricValues:!f,timeRange:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}'),useNormalizedEsInterval:!t),schema:segment,type:date_histogram),(enabled:!t,id:'3',params:(field:json.controller.keyword,missingBucket:!f,missingBucketLabel:Missing,order:desc,orderBy:'1',otherBucket:!t,otherBucketLabel:Other,size:5),schema:group,type:terms)),params:(valueAxes:!((id:'ValueAxis-1',name:'LeftAxis-1',position:left,scale:(mode:normal,type:linear),show:!t,style:(),title:(text:'Sum+Request+Duration:+json.duration_s'),type:value)))))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [üìà Kibana: Rails sum latency aggregated (split)](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/visualize/create?type=line&indexPattern=7092c4e2-4eb5-46f2-8305-a7da2edad090&_a=(filters:!((query:(match:(json.type.keyword:(query:git,type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.type:(query:git,type:phrase))))),query:(language:kuery,query:''),vis:(aggs:!((enabled:!t,id:'1',params:(field:json.duration_s),schema:metric,type:sum),(enabled:!t,id:'2',params:(drop_partials:!t,extended_bounds:(),field:json.time,interval:auto,min_doc_count:1,scaleMetricValues:!f,timeRange:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}'),useNormalizedEsInterval:!t),schema:segment,type:date_histogram),(enabled:!t,id:'3',params:(field:json.controller.keyword,missingBucket:!f,missingBucketLabel:Missing,order:desc,orderBy:'1',otherBucket:!t,otherBucketLabel:Other,size:5),schema:group,type:terms)),params:(valueAxes:!((id:'ValueAxis-1',name:'LeftAxis-1',position:left,scale:(mode:normal,type:linear),show:!t,style:(),title:(text:'Sum+Request+Duration:+json.duration_s'),type:value)))))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [üìà Kibana: Rails percentile latency aggregated](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/visualize/create?type=line&indexPattern=7092c4e2-4eb5-46f2-8305-a7da2edad090&_a=(filters:!((query:(match:(json.type.keyword:(query:git,type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.type:(query:git,type:phrase))))),query:(language:kuery,query:''),vis:(aggs:!((enabled:!t,id:'1',params:(field:json.duration_s,percents:!(95)),schema:metric,type:percentiles),(enabled:!t,id:'2',params:(drop_partials:!t,extended_bounds:(),field:json.time,interval:auto,min_doc_count:1,scaleMetricValues:!f,timeRange:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}'),useNormalizedEsInterval:!t),schema:segment,type:date_histogram)),params:(valueAxes:!((id:'ValueAxis-1',name:'LeftAxis-1',position:left,scale:(mode:normal,type:linear),show:!t,style:(),title:(text:'p95+Request+Duration:+json.duration_s'),type:value)))))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))

panels.title: workhorse SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

Monitors the Workhorse instance running in the Git fleet, via the HTTP interface. This SLI
excludes API requests, which have their own SLI with tigher latency thresholds.
Websocket connections are excluded from the apdex score.



### Observability Tools

* [Google Stackdriver Continuous Profiling](https://console.cloud.google.com/profiler;timespan=4h/workhorse-git;type=CPU/cpu?project=gitlab-production)
* [üêû Sentry Releases: gitlab/gitlab-workhorse-gitlabcom](https://sentry.gitlab.net/gitlab/gitlab-workhorse-gitlabcom/releases?environment=${environment})
* [üêû Sentry issues](https://sentry.gitlab.net/gitlab/gitlab-workhorse-gitlabcom/issues?environment=${environment})
* [üìñ Kibana: Workhorse logs](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/discover?_a=(columns:!(json.method,json.remote_ip,json.status,json.uri,json.duration_ms),filters:!((query:(match:(json.type.keyword:(query:git,type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.type:(query:git,type:phrase))))),index:'a4f5b470-edde-11ea-81e5-155ba78758d4')&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [üìñ Kibana: Workhorse slow request logs](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/discover?_a=(columns:!(json.method,json.remote_ip,json.status,json.uri,json.duration_ms),filters:!((query:(match:(json.type.keyword:(query:git,type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.type:(query:git,type:phrase)))),(query:(range:(json.duration_ms:(gte:10000))))),index:'a4f5b470-edde-11ea-81e5-155ba78758d4',sort:!(!(json.duration_ms,desc)))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [üìñ Kibana: Workhorse failed request logs](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/discover?_a=(columns:!(json.method,json.remote_ip,json.status,json.uri,json.duration_ms),filters:!((query:(match:(json.type.keyword:(query:git,type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.type:(query:git,type:phrase)))),(query:(range:(json.status:(gte:500))))),index:'a4f5b470-edde-11ea-81e5-155ba78758d4')&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))

panels.title: Details

panels.description: Apdex is a measure of requests that complete within a tolerable period of time for the service. Higher is better.

seriesOverrides.alias: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)
SLO

targets.legendFormat: {{ region }} apdex
6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

panels.title: workhorse_auth_api SLI Apdex

panels.description: Error rates are a measure of unhandled service exceptions per second. Client errors are excluded when possible. Lower is better

seriesOverrides.alias: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

targets.legendFormat: {{ region }} error ratio
6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

panels.title: workhorse_auth_api SLI Error Ratio

panels.description: The operation rate is the sum total of all requests being handle for all components within this service. Note that a single user request can lead to requests to multiple components. Higher is busier.

targets.legendFormat: {{ region }} RPS

panels.title: workhorse_auth_api SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

Monitors Workhorse API endpoints, running in the Git fleet, via the HTTP interface.
Workhorse API requests have much tigher latency requirements, as these requests originate in GitLab-Shell
and are on the critical path for authentication of Git SSH commands.



### Observability Tools

* [Google Stackdriver Continuous Profiling](https://console.cloud.google.com/profiler;timespan=4h/workhorse-git;type=CPU/cpu?project=gitlab-production)
* [üêû Sentry Releases: gitlab/gitlab-workhorse-gitlabcom](https://sentry.gitlab.net/gitlab/gitlab-workhorse-gitlabcom/releases?environment=${environment})
* [üêû Sentry issues](https://sentry.gitlab.net/gitlab/gitlab-workhorse-gitlabcom/issues?environment=${environment})
* [üìñ Kibana: Workhorse logs](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/discover?_a=(columns:!(json.method,json.remote_ip,json.status,json.uri,json.duration_ms),filters:!((query:(match:(json.type.keyword:(query:git,type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.type:(query:git,type:phrase))))),index:'a4f5b470-edde-11ea-81e5-155ba78758d4')&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
